context: Hi there! What type of movies are you into?
I was thinking of seeing something with Christopher Walken tonight. Any ideas?
Hmm Ever seen Sarah, Plain and Tall ?
An example of a movie I liked was The Prophecy (1995) . He was great. I saw that but it's been awhile since I saw that one. It might be worth a look.
Not sure I've ever seen that one! I'm not very knowledgeable about that actors movies...
He was an arch angel in it, really evil. Have you see The Dead Zone (1983) ? Based on Stephen King.
resp: Oh ok, so you're into drama! How about something like The Seventh Sign (1988) ?
